idea:
Brief Concept?

Eateta shall be an online application whereby we will list all restaurants in various categories. This listing is based on the popularity of each hotel and highest is proposed to be valued at INR 100 & lowest is likely to be INR 25.

The users accessing this application and booking orders from a particular hotel shall get a discount from the total billed amount. The amount of such discount shall depend on the listed hotel and is likely to be equal to the price listed for the respective hotel where from he / she shall order the food.

Currently, under this application, we will only list restaurants, not their menu. The menu listing will follow depending on the response we get from the use of this app.

 

How does it Work?
When a customer places an order for food from a particular hotel listed on Eateta, our proprietary software shall use a comprehensive algorithm to determine and change the price of that particular Hotel / Restaurant for the next customer, basis the increased demand of such hotel / restaurant. The customer who placed order shall receive a discount based on the existing listed price of the respective hotel / restaurant at the time of placing his / her order.

 

What is Food Stocks Exchange?
It is a stock market-based hotel / restaurant pricing system wherein the prices for each hotel / restaurant listed on the application changes real time based on the demand / orders placed by the customers. One may think of this as a deal where you control the prices of all the restaurants, avail for the best discounts and enjoy the food from your favourite hotel / restaurant!
name: EATETA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The easiest way to track your money in real time. an online finance manager providing an automated view of  finances anytime, anywhere.
